pages.text: There are many basic functions that maids are able to perform, such as:$(li)By default, the maid will actively pick up items, arrows and experience orbs around her. The main GUI has a button to switch pick up mode;$(li)By default, the maid will always follow the player.

$(li)Shift right-clicking maid with an empty hand can switch sitting mode. In sitting mode, the doesn't do anything, including avoiding danger.$(li)When the maid ride on other entities, Shift right-clicking with an empty hand can remove them.$(li)The player can use a golden apple or potion on a maid by right-clicking them while holding the item.

$(li)The experience picked up by the maid can be converted into an Bottle o' Enchanting if the player right-click the maid while holding a bottle.$(li)The maid can equip the skull and render model of it.$(li)Right-click the maid with an empty nameplate, and you can name it directly.

$(li)After install Journey Map Mod, the coordinates displayed by the maid at death can be directly clicked to save as the coordinates of the Journey Map, or you can ctrl click to view it under the big map window of the Journey Map.
